APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_DATE = #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /*结算-应收单-核销应收单*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE SET VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERIFY_AMOUNT = VERIFY_AMOUNT + #{writeoffAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, UNVERIFY_AMOUNT = UNVERIFY_AMOUNT - #{writeoffAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100 WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /*结算-应收单-审核反审核空运其他应收单*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE SET
STATEMENT_BILL_NO = #{statementBillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO+1, AUDIT_USER_CODE = #{auditUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_USER_NAME = #{auditUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_DATE = #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE (ID,VERSION_NO) IN
(#{item.id},#{item.versionNo})
AND ACTIVE=#{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BILL_TYPE=#{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND APPROVE_STATUS=#{conApproveStatus}
mapper.select:
SELECT /*结算-应收单-根据ID与分区键查询应收单*/
FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE WHERE (ID) IN
(#{item.id})
AND ACTIVE=#{active}

SELECT /*结算-应收单-根据应收单与分区键查询应收单*/
FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE WHERE (RECEIVABLE_NO) IN
(#{item.receivableNo})
AND ACTIVE=#{active}

UPDATE STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE SET UNLOCK_DATE_TIME = SYSDATE+#{lockTime}/60/24, LOCK_CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_NO=VERSION_NO+1
RECEIVABLE_NO = #{receivableNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DECODE(UNVERIFY_AMOUNT,0,NULL,UNVERIFY_AMOUNT)>0
mapper.update:
UPDATE /*批量标记/反标记应收单*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE SET VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1, STAMP= #{stamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE (ID,VERSION_NO) IN
(#{item.id},#{item.versionNo})
mapper.select:
SELECT /*结算-应收单-根据来源单号查询应收单信息*/
FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE WHERE WAYBILL_NO IN
#{item}
AND ACTIVE='Y' AND SOURCE_BILL_TYPE='W' AND BILL_TYPE IN ('OR','DR','DL','CR','AAC','DLC')

SELECT /*结算-应收单-根据对账单号查询应收单信息*/
FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE R WHERE R.STATEMENT_BILL_NO IN
#{item}
AND R.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND R.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT > 0
